languages.text: {n}Ульфар шумно втягивает воздух, пробует ваш запах на вкус.{/n} "Чутье велит промолчать. Подобные знания можно разделить лишь с т{mf|ем|ой}, в ком уверен полностью".
{n}Ulfar sucks in a breath, tasting your scent.{/n} "Instinct bids me to remain silent. Such knowledge is not to be shared with just anyone, only those who possess my complete trust."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар шумно втягивает воздух, пробует ваш запах на вкус.{/n} "Чутье велит промолчать. Подобные знания можно разделить лишь с т{mf|ем|ой}, в ком уверен полностью".

languages.text: {n}乌尔法吸了口气，嗅着你的味道。{/n}“我的本能要求我保持沉默。这些知识不能随便告诉别人，只能分享给那些我完全信任的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sucks in a breath, tasting your scent.{/n} "Instinct bids me to remain silent. Such knowledge is not to be shared with just anyone, only those who possess my complete trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法吸了口气，嗅着你的味道。{/n}“我的本能要求我保持沉默。这些知识不能随便告诉别人，只能分享给那些我完全信任的人。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar respira hondo, estudiando tu olor.{/n} «El instinto me indica que debo guardar silencio. Hay cosas que no puedo compartir con cualquiera, solo con quienes se han ganado mi confianza absoluta».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sucks in a breath, tasting your scent.{/n} "Instinct bids me to remain silent. Such knowledge is not to be shared with just anyone, only those who possess my complete trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar respira hondo, estudiando tu olor.{/n} «El instinto me indica que debo guardar silencio. Hay cosas que no puedo compartir con cualquiera, solo con quienes se han ganado mi confianza absoluta».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは息を吸い込み、あなたの香りを味わう。{/n}「本能が俺に沈黙を守るよう命じる。そのような知識は誰とも分かち合えない。俺が心から信頼した者だけが分かち合えるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sucks in a breath, tasting your scent.{/n} "Instinct bids me to remain silent. Such knowledge is not to be shared with just anyone, only those who possess my complete trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは息を吸い込み、あなたの香りを味わう。{/n}「本能が俺に沈黙を守るよう命じる。そのような知識は誰とも分かち合えない。俺が心から信頼した者だけが分かち合えるのだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar atmet tief ein, um deinen Duft zu kosten.{/n} "Der Instinkt gebietet mir, zu schweigen. Ein solches Wissen darf nicht einfach mit jedem geteilt werden, nur mit jenen, die mein volles Vertrauen genießen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sucks in a breath, tasting your scent.{/n} "Instinct bids me to remain silent. Such knowledge is not to be shared with just anyone, only those who possess my complete trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar atmet tief ein, um deinen Duft zu kosten.{/n} "Der Instinkt gebietet mir, zu schweigen. Ein solches Wissen darf nicht einfach mit jedem geteilt werden, nur mit jenen, die mein volles Vertrauen genießen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar inspire profondément pour goûter votre odeur.{/n} « Mon instinct me commande de ne rien dire. De telles connaissances ne doivent pas être divulguées au tout-venant, mais seulement aux personnes qui ont toute ma confiance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sucks in a breath, tasting your scent.{/n} "Instinct bids me to remain silent. Such knowledge is not to be shared with just anyone, only those who possess my complete trust."

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sucks in a breath, tasting your scent.{/n} "Instinct bids me to remain silent. Such knowledge is not to be shared with just anyone, only those who possess my complete trust."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, nefes alıp kokunu içine çekiyor.{/n} "İçgüdülerim sessiz kalmamı istiyor. Böyle soruların cevabı öyle herkese verilmez, yalnızca koşulsuz güvendiklerime verilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sucks in a breath, tasting your scent.{/n} "Instinct bids me to remain silent. Such knowledge is not to be shared with just anyone, only those who possess my complete trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar nefes alıp kokunun tadına bakıyor.{/n} "İçgüdülerim sessiz kalmamı istiyor. Böyle soruların cevabı öyle herkese verilmez, sadece benim koşulsuz güvendiğim kişilere verilir."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
